mean_cn: n. 解决；结算；协议；定居
mean_en: a formal agreement or decision that ends an argument or dispute
word_etyma: settle 解决，安居+ ment 表示行为、行为的过程或结果 → n.解决；殖民；殖民地
short_phrase: black man and white man come to a settlement
sentence: Let's work together; I think we can come to some kind of settlement.
sentence_trans: 让我们合作吧，我想我们能解决它。
